BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PISLEG_CASE_BILL_GEN_TRN( GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_CASE_ID, STR_CASE_NUMBER, STR_PO_ORDER_NUMBER, DT_PO_ORDER_DATE, STR_TYPE_OF_BILL, STR_BILL_NUMBER, DT_BILL_DATE, NUM_TOT_AMT_TOBE_PAID, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID) VALUES (?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'DD-Mon-YYYY'),?,?,to_date(?,'DD-Mon-YYYY'),?,to_date(?,'DD-Mon-YYYY'),nvl(?,null),to_date(?,'DD-Mon-YYYY'),to_date(?,'DD-Mon-YYYY'),?,?)

UPDATE PISLEG_CASE_BILL_GEN_TRN SET STR_CASE_ID=?, STR_CASE_NUMBER=?, STR_PO_ORDER_NUMBER=?, DT_PO_ORDER_DATE=to_date(?,'DD-Mon-YYYY'), STR_TYPE_OF_BILL=?,STR_BILL_NUMBER=?, DT_BILL_DATE=to_date(?,'DD-Mon-YYYY'), NUM_TOT_AMT_TOBE_PAID=?, DT_DATE_OF_PAYMENT=to_date(?,'DD-Mon-YYYY'), STR_CHEQUE_NUMBER=?, DT_CHEQUE_DATE=to_date(?,'DD-Mon-YYYY'), STR_BANK_DETAILS=?, STR_PAYMENT_FLAG=?, STR_BILL_ACCEPTANCE_FLAG=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=to_date(?,'DD-Mon-YYYY'),GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=nvl(?,null) WHERE STR_CASE_ID=? AND STR_CASE_NUMBER=? and STR_PO_ORDER_NUMBER=? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISLEG_CASE_BILL_GEN_TRN SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_CASE_ID=? AND STR_CASE_NUMBER =? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? and STR_PO_ORDER_NUMBER=?
